workshoptitle: DBA Essentials - Monitoring and tuning Oracle Database 21c

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Prepare setup
tutorials.description: How to download your ORM stack and update security rules for an existing VCN.

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Setup compute instance
tutorials.description: How to provision the workshop environment and connect to it

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Initialize environment
tutorials.description: How to initialize and start all the workshop components.

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Monitor the general state of your database
tutorials.description: How to monitor the state of the database from Oracle Enterprise Manager Cloud Control (Oracle EMCC).

tutorials.title: Lab 5: Configure Automatic SQL Tuning Advisor
tutorials.description: How to improve the performance of the database using Automatic SQL Tuning Advisor from Oracle Enterprise Manager Cloud Control (Oracle EMCC).

tutorials.title: Need help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
